com.aj.android.commons.view

Class ImageViewUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aj.android.commons.view.ImageViewUtils

  • public class ImageViewUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of method for Resizing Bitmap, calculating sample size and scaling bitmap based on various scaling options.
    Author:
    Akhil Jain

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ImageViewUtils.ScalingOptions
      Enum which provides scaling options for the bitmap / image.

        Gets the Point dimensions for the given imageview.
        Parameters:
        imageView - -ImageView.
        Returns:
        Point -point object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        See Also:
        #getDimensions(ImageView, boolean)}.

      • getInputStream

        public static java.io.InputStream getInputStream(Bitmap bitmap,
                                                 CompressFormat format,
                                                 int compressQuality)
        Get the stream format for the given Bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - - Bitmap object.
        format - - CompressFormat format of the image.
        compressQuality - - Hint to the compressor, 0-100. 0 meaning compress for small size, 100 meaning compress for max quality. Some formats, like PNG which is lossless, will ignore the quality setting.
        Returns:
        InputStream based on provided settings
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.

      • getScaledBitmap

        public static Bitmap getScaledBitmap(Context context,
                                     Uri uriPath,
                                     int requiredWidth,
                                     int requiredHeight)
        Gets scaled Bitmap for the given Uri.
        Scales the Bitmap to less resolution, if the required width and required height are lesser than bitmap width and height.
        Takes aspect-ratio into consideration while scaling.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        uriPath - -Uri path of the image.
        requiredWidth - -int required width.
        requiredHeight - -int required height.
        Returns:
        Bitmap -scaled bitmap.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is empty.
        See Also:
        ContentProviderUtils#getFilePathFromUri(Context, Uri)}., #getScaledBitmap(String, int, int)}.

      • getScaledBitmap

        public static Bitmap getScaledBitmap(java.lang.String filePath,
                                     int requiredWidth,
                                     int requiredHeight)
        Gets scaled Bitmap for the given String.
        Scales the Bitmap to less resolution, if the required width and required height are lesser than bitmap width and height.
        Takes aspect-ratio into consideration while scaling.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        filePath - -String absolute file path for image.
        requiredWidth - -int required width.
        requiredHeight - -int required height.
        Returns:
        Bitmap -scaled bitmap.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        See Also:
        #calculateInSampleSize(android.graphics.BitmapFactory.Options, int, int)}.

                                               CompressFormat format,
                                               int quality,
                                               int requiredWidth,
                                               int requiredHeight)
        Gets scaled Bitmap for the given String.
        Scales the Bitmap to less resolution, if the required width and required height are lesser than bitmap width and height.
        Takes aspect-ratio into consideration while scaling.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - -Bitmap.
        format - -CompressFormat.
        quality - -quality of the image.
        requiredWidth - -int required width.
        requiredHeight - -int required height.
        Returns:
        Bitmap -scaled bitmap.
        Throws:

      • getExactScaledBitmap

        public static Bitmap getExactScaledBitmap(Context context,
                                          Uri uriPath,
                                          int requiredWidth,
                                          int requiredHeight)
        Sample down or Increase the Bitmap exactly to given dimensions.
        Does NOT takes aspect-ratio into consideration.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        uriPath - -Uri path of the image.
        requiredWidth - -int required width.
        requiredHeight - -int required height.
        Returns:
        Bitmap -exactly scaled bitmap.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is empty.
        See Also:
        ContentProviderUtils#getRealPathFromURI(Context, Uri)}., #getExactScaledBitmap(String, int, int)}.

      • getExactScaledBitmap

        public static Bitmap getExactScaledBitmap(java.lang.String filePath,
                                          int requiredWidth,
                                          int requiredHeight)
        Sample down or Increase the Bitmap exactly to given dimensions.
        Does NOT takes aspect-ratio into consideration.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        filePath - -String absolute file path for image.
        requiredWidth - -int required width.
        requiredHeight - -int required height.
        Returns:
        Bitmap -exactly scaled bitmap.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        See Also:
        Bitmap#createScaledBitmap(Bitmap, int, int, boolean)}.

      • calculateInSampleSize

        public static int calculateInSampleSize(BitmapFactory.Options options,
                                        int reqWidth,
                                        int reqHeight)
        Calculate sampling size for image.
        Parameters:
        options - -BitmapFactory.Options is options for bitmap factoring to calculate the size;
        reqWidth - -int required width for the image.
        reqHeight - -int required height for the image.
        Returns:
        int -sampling size for the image,for loading in memory.

      • getBitmapBasedOnScalingOptions

        public static Bitmap getBitmapBasedOnScalingOptions(Context context,
                                                    Uri uriPath,
                                                    int requiredWidth,
                                                    int requiredHeight,
                                                    ImageViewUtils.ScalingOptions scalingPreference)
        Gets the scaled down bitmap from the given image Uri based on given ImageViewUtils.ScalingOptions.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        uriPath - -Uri path of the image.
        requiredWidth - -int required width.
        requiredHeight - -int required height.
        scalingPreference - -ImageViewUtils.ScalingOptions to specify on what basis images have to be scaled.
        Returns:
        Bitmap -scaled bitmap based on scaling options.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any String parameter is empty or null.
        See Also:
        ContentProviderUtils#getRealPathFromURI(Context, Uri)}., #getBitmapBasedOnScalingOptions(String, int, int, ScalingOptions)}.

      • getBitmapBasedOnScalingOptions

        public static Bitmap getBitmapBasedOnScalingOptions(java.lang.String filePath,
                                                    int requiredWidth,
                                                    int requiredHeight,
                                                    ImageViewUtils.ScalingOptions scalingPreference)
        Gets the scaled down bitmap from the given image String file path based on given ImageViewUtils.ScalingOptions.
        Parameters:
        context - -Context.
        filePath - -String absolute file path for image.
        requiredWidth - -int required width.
        requiredHeight - -int required height.
        scalingPreference - -ImageViewUtils.ScalingOptions to specify on what basis images have to be scaled.
        Returns:
        Bitmap -scaled bitmap based on scaling options.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
